blocks.name: pl1cn
blocks.content: A univariate polynomial is continuous. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm pl1cn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ce1, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, ccrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, ctrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
} = {
  pf1ind(hs1, hs2, hs0, c6, c4, cfv(cplusg, c4), cfv(cmulr, c4), crn(cfv(ce1, c4)), cfv(c0, c1), w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cplusg, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cmulr, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cxp(c6, csn(cv(hs1))), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cres(cid, c6), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  eqid(crn(cfv(ce1, c4)))
  3expb(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), crn(cfv(ce1, c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), crn(cfv(ce1, c4))), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cplusg, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  3adant3l(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), crn(cfv(ce1, c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), crn(cfv(ce1, c4))), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cplusg, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  3adant2l(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), crn(cfv(ce1, c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cplusg, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  eqeltrd(co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cplusg, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2), cmpt(hs3, c6, co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cfv(cplusg, c4), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))))
  offval2(hs3, cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs2), c6, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), universe, universe, universe, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))))
  cnmpt12(hs3, hs4, hs5, c6, co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cfv(cplusg, c4), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), c2, c2, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), c2, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), c2, c6, c6, co(cv(hs4), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs5)), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cmpo(hs4, hs5, c6, c6, co(cv(hs4), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs5))), co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
  syl5eqelr(cmpo(hs4, hs5, c6, c6, co(cv(hs4), cfv(cplusg, c4), cv(hs5))), co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2), cfv(cplusf, c4), w0)
  plusffval(hs4, hs5, cfv(cplusf, c4), c6, cfv(cplusg, c4), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c4))
  3syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cplusf, c4), co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)), wcel(c4, ctrg), wcel(c4, ctgp))
  tgpcn(c4, cfv(cplusf, c4), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cplusf, c4))
  oveq12(cv(hs4), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cv(hs5), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cfv(cplusg, c4))
  3expb(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), crn(cfv(ce1, c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), crn(cfv(ce1, c4))), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cmulr, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  3adant3l(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), crn(cfv(ce1, c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), crn(cfv(ce1, c4))), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cmulr, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  3adant2l(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), crn(cfv(ce1, c4))), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cmulr, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  eqeltrd(co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cmulr, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2), cmpt(hs3, c6, co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cfv(cmulr, c4), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))))
  offval2(hs3, cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs2), c6, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), universe, universe, universe, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))))
  a1i(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))), wcel(c6, universe))
  fvexi(c6, cbs, c4)
  fvexd(cv(hs1), cv(hs3), wa(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))), wcel(cv(hs3), c6)))
  fvexd(cv(hs2), cv(hs3), wa(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))), wcel(cv(hs3), c6)))
  cnmpt12(hs3, hs4, hs5, c6, co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cfv(cmulr, c4), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), c2, c2, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), c2, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), c2, c6, c6, co(cv(hs4), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs5)), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))))
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(hs3, c6, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3))), co(c2, ccn, c2), cv(hs1), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))))
  syl2anc(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cmpt(hs3, c6, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)))), w0, wfn(cv(hs1), cuni(c2)))
  3ad2ant2(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wfn(cv(hs1), cuni(c2)))
  ffnd(cv(hs1), cuni(c2), cuni(c2), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  cnf(cv(hs1), c2, c2, cuni(c2), cuni(c2))
  biimpa(w0, wfn(cv(hs1), cuni(c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cmpt(hs3, c6, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)))))
  syl5rbbr(w0, wfn(cv(hs1), cuni(c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cmpt(hs3, c6, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)))), wfn(cv(hs1), c6))
  dffn5(hs3, cv(hs1), c6)
  fneq2d(cv(hs1), c6, cuni(c2), w0)
  simp2(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(hs3, c6, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), co(c2, ccn, c2), cv(hs2), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))))
  syl2anc(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))), wceq(cv(hs2), cmpt(hs3, c6, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))), w0, wfn(cv(hs2), cuni(c2)))
  simp1(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  3ad2ant3(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wfn(cv(hs2), cuni(c2)))
  ffnd(cv(hs2), cuni(c2), cuni(c2), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  cnf(cv(hs2), c2, c2, cuni(c2), cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  biimpa(w0, wfn(cv(hs2), cuni(c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), cmpt(hs3, c6, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))))
  syl5rbbr(w0, wfn(cv(hs2), cuni(c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), cmpt(hs3, c6, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))), wfn(cv(hs2), c6))
  dffn5(hs3, cv(hs2), c6)
  fneq2d(cv(hs2), c6, cuni(c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c6, cuni(c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c6)))
  toponuni(c2, c6)
  simp3(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c6)))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(cmpo(hs4, hs5, c6, c6, co(cv(hs4), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs5))), co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
  syl5eqelr(cmpo(hs4, hs5, c6, c6, co(cv(hs4), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs5))), co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2), cfv(cplusf, cfv(cmgp, c4)), w0)
  plusffval(hs4, hs5, cfv(cplusf, cfv(cmgp, c4)), c6, cfv(cmulr, c4), cfv(cmgp, c4))
  mgpbas(c6, cfv(cmgp, c4), c4)
  mgpplusg(cfv(cmulr, c4), cfv(cmgp, c4), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cplusf, cfv(cmgp, c4)), co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)), wcel(c4, ctrg))
  mulrcn(c4, cfv(cplusf, cfv(cmgp, c4)), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cplusf, cfv(cmgp, c4)))
  oveq12(cv(hs4), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cv(hs5), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cfv(cmulr, c4))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cxp(c6, csn(cv(hs1))), co(c2, ccn, c2))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c6), co(c2, ccn, c2))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cplusg, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cmulr, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c2))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c6)), wcel(cxp(c6, csn(cv(hs1))), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c6)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c6)), wcel(cv(hs1), c6))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c6), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c6)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c6))
  cnconst2(c2, c6, c2, c6, cv(hs1))
  syl(w0, wcel(cres(cid, c6), co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c6)))
  3syl(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c6)), wcel(c4, ctrg), wcel(c4, ctgp))
  trgtgp(c4)
  tgptopon(c4, c2, c6)
  idcn(c2, c6)
  syl6eleq(cfv(c0, c1), crn(cfv(ce1, c4)), crn(c0), w0)
  ffvelrnd(c0, c1, crn(c0), c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c0, c5, crn(c0)), wcel(c4, ccrg))
  4syl(wcel(c4, ccrg), wf(c0, c5, crn(c0)), wcel(c0, co(c3, crh, co(c4, cpws, c6))), wf(c0, c5, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, c6))), wfn(c0, c5))
  evl1rhm(c4, c0, c3, co(c4, cpws, c6), c6)
  eqid(co(c4, cpws, c6))
  rhmf(c0, c3, co(c4, cpws, c6), c5, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, c6)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, c6)))
  ffn(c0, c5, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, c6)))

  dffn3(c0, c5)
  rneqi(c0, cfv(ce1, c4))

  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(hs2), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cplusg, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(cv(hs1), cof(cfv(cmulr, c4)), cv(hs2)), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cxp(c6, csn(cv(hs1))), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cres(cid, c6), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs3.c(cfv(cplusg, c4))

  diff.hs3.c(cv(hs1))

thm pl1cn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)∈(c2[Cn]c2))
  ⊣ c3 =(Poly1 ` c4)
  ⊣ c0 =(eval1 ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c6 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ CRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ TopRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c5)
} = {
  pf1ind(hs1, hs2, hs0, c6, c4, (+ ` c4), (× ` c4), ran((eval1 ` c4)), (c0 ` c1), w0, (c0 ` c1)∈(c2[Cn]c2), hs1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2), hs2 ∈(c2[Cn]c2), (hs1[oF((+ ` c4))]hs2)∈(c2[Cn]c2), (hs1[oF((× ` c4))]hs2)∈(c2[Cn]c2), hs0 ∈(c2[Cn]c2), (c6 × { hs1 })∈(c2[Cn]c2), (= |` c6)∈(c2[Cn]c2))
  eqid(ran((eval1 ` c4)))
  3expb(w0, (hs1 ∈ ran((eval1 ` c4))∧ hs1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2)), (hs2 ∈ ran((eval1 ` c4))∧ hs2 ∈(c2[Cn]c2)), (hs1[oF((+ ` c4))]hs2)∈(c2[Cn]c2))
  3adant3l(w0, (hs1 ∈ ran((eval1 ` c4))∧ hs1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2)), hs2 ∈ ran((eval1 ` c4)), hs2 ∈(c2[Cn]c2), (hs1[oF((+ ` c4))]hs2)∈(c2[Cn]c2))
  3adant2l(w0, hs1 ∈ ran((eval1 ` c4)), hs1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2), hs2 ∈(c2[Cn]c2), (hs1[oF((+ ` c4))]hs2)∈(c2[Cn]c2))
  eqeltrd((hs1[oF((+ ` c4))]hs2), (c2[Cn]c2), (hs3 ∈ c6 ↦((hs1 ` hs3)[(+ ` c4)](hs2 ` hs3))), (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2)∧ hs2 ∈(c2[Cn]c2)))
  offval2(hs3, hs1, (+ ` c4), hs2, c6, (hs1 ` hs3), (hs2 ` hs3), universe, universe, universe, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2)∧ hs2 ∈(c2[Cn]c2)))
  cnmpt12(hs3, hs4, hs5, c6, ((hs1 ` hs3)[(+ ` c4)](hs2 ` hs3)), c2, c2, (hs1 ` hs3), c2, (hs2 ` hs3), c2, c6, c6, (hs4[(+ ` c4)]hs5), (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2)∧ hs2 ∈(c2[Cn]c2)))
  3ad2ant1(w0, hs1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2), hs2 ∈(c2[Cn]c2), (hs4 ∈ c6, hs5 ∈ c6 ↦(hs4[(+ ` c4)]hs5))∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
  syl5eqelr((hs4 ∈ c6, hs5 ∈ c6 ↦(hs4[(+ ` c4)]hs5)), ((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2), (+f ` c4), w0)
  plusffval(hs4, hs5, (+f ` c4), c6, (+ ` c4), c4)
  eqid((+ ` c4))
  3syl(w0, (+f ` c4)∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2), c4 ∈ TopRing, c4 ∈ TopGrp)
  tgpcn(c4, (+f ` c4), c2)
